activities: INNODOC, LLC provides Invoice Processing services to Organization globally. Non electronic invoices are converted to Electronic data for customer's ease of handling and manipulation. Invoices are sent to INNODOC, LLC via internet to a secure ftp site. The invoices are for the use of telecommunication within the organization and for the purchase of consumer products. Once the data has been extracted and converted to electronic, the data will be archived for a period of 1 year in a SAS 70 Type II accredited data center. All non-electronic data and media will be returned to customer or destroyed based on customer requirements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: private sector developed dispute resolution mechanism that incorporates the Safe Harbor Framework(s), the EU and/or Swiss data protection authorities
